mapper.select: select r_num,r_guide,r_day,r_time,r_findDoc, r_regdate, m_id from( select ROWNUM num,r_num,r_guide,r_day,r_time,r_findDoc, r_regdate, m_id from( SELECT * FROM IG_reserv where m_id = #{m_id} order by r_num desc)) where num between #{begin} and #{end}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ig_reserv where r_guide LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{r_content}, '%'))
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ig_reserv( r_num, r_guide, r_day, r_time, r_findDoc, r_regdate, m_id) VALUES ( r_num.NEXTVAL, #{r_guide},#{r_day}, #{r_time}, #{r_findDoc}, SYSDATE, #{m_id})
mapper.update: UPDATE ig_reserv SET r_content=#{r_content} where m_id =#{m_id}
